items.title: Tacos al Pastor
items.description: Delicious tacos al pastor with pineapple and cilantro.
instructions: Cut the meat into small pieces and cook over medium-high heat.
Heat the tortillas on a griddle.
Dice the pineapple, onion, and cilantro.
Assemble the tacos with the meat and diced ingredients.

items.title: Green Enchiladas
items.description: Traditional enchiladas with green sauce, chicken, and cheese.
instructions: Warm the tortillas slightly to make them flexible.
Fill each tortilla with shredded chicken.
Roll the tortillas and place them on a plate.
Cover with green salsa and shredded cheese.
Serve with diced onion and sour cream.

items.title: Traditional Guacamole
items.description: The classic Mexican guacamole, perfect for any occasion.
instructions: Cut the avocados in half and remove the pit.
Mash the avocado pulp in a bowl.
Finely dice the tomato, onion, and cilantro.
Mix all ingredients with the avocado.
Squeeze the lime and add salt to taste.
If you want it spicy, add finely chopped serrano pepper.
